titleStmt.title: A letter from John Cockburn, D.D., to his friend in London giving an account why the other narratives about Bourignianism are not yet publish'd, and answering some reflections pass'd upon the first.
titleStmt.author: Cockburn, John, 1652-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Keblewhite ... and Hannah Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
